title: Bering Land Bridge National Preserve: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Our world is changing!  Climate change is happening.  It is occurring because of both natural events and actions caused by man.  And Alaska is on the forefront of this issue.  All Curriculum Materials   Climate Change Curriculum    Climate Change Curriculum Learn More     Traveling Trunks If you need a little extra something to make your curriculum pop, try one of our education kits. Learn about Alaska's gold rush history, the flooding of the Bering Land Bridge, wildlife adaptations, and much more. All Traveling Trunks   Traveling Trunks    Traveling Trunks Learn More     Guest Speakers Bring a ranger to your classroom to learn about topics relevant to Bering Land Bridge, Alaska history, earth science, biology, culture, and much more! All Guest Speakers   Guest Speaker    Guest Speaker Learn More
